AliasGroup.name: Aliase_Help
AliasGroup.script:
--[[ Likely the basic answers you want on triggers are at: https://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Introduction#Aliases
In short an alias: replaces a command the user enters with the script of your making.
Any code written in the Your_Aliases folder will never be changed by Pathia updates. We highly recommend backing up all the Your_ files in your `The Eternal City` mudlet profile. We have made an aliase to easy open the folder these files are in. To run it type `tecclient Your_Files` Also you will see that aliase in Your_Aliases folder.
Parthia is intended to be a community project. As we wrote code we made certain to comment nearly every line. There will be many examples to reference in TEC_Client_Aliases.
We are happy to answer questions. Parthia's discord server is: https://discord.gg/QGztVx Our github page is: https://github.com/TheEternalCitizens/mudlet-integration
Another wonderful source of answers and knowledge is: Mudlet's discord server: https://discord.gg/FfkEx7 mudlet manual: https://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Contents mudlet function reference: https://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Lua_Functions ^This is not a complete list but it is a wonderful start^
Good lua references: https://www.lua.org/pil/contents.html https://docs.coronalabs.com/api/index.html --Good for if you already know the basics.
As you write code you can share it at the parthia discord server on the player-scripts channel. ]]--
